title: Hi Hater (w/ Shane Gillis)
description: Jay recaps Reddit reviews to Dan, which take the sting off the criticism a bit. The guys imagine the love affair between Cardi B and Jacob. Shane Gillis joins the show and discusses his disgust of local news and debates who is the best weather man in the business.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
